products.name: GreenWipe Flushables
products.description: Disposable wipes, also known as wet wipes or moist towelettes, are pre-moistened disposable cloths designed for various cleaning and personal hygiene purposes. They are typically made from non-woven materials, such as polyester or polypropylene, and are infused with water, cleansing agents, moisturizers, and sometimes fragrances or disinfectants.
